 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָזַן‎</span>, ? earlier <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָזן‎</span>, so [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 31</sup>] **verb** ==be weighty, judicious, commanding== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be weighty, grave, firm of judgement***; Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוֺזֵן‎</span> = Biblical Hebrew, so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוזנים‎</span> [[Eccl.44.4|Eccl 44:4]]); — only **Qal** ***Participle*** plural as substantive, ***rulers, potentates***, \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְלָכִים‎</span>: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹזְנִים‎</span> [[Judg.5.3|Judg 5:3]]; [[Hab.1.10|Hab 1:10]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוֺ‎</span> [[Ps.2.2|Ps 2:2]]; [[Prov.8.15|Prov 8:15]]; [[Prov.31.4|Prov 31:4]], \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁפְטֵי אֶרֶץ‎</span> [[Isa.40.23|Isa 40:23]].
